summary: Completed comprehensive testing of newly added Crypto Dashboard section. All 8 widgets are displaying correctly with proper styling and functionality. Navigation with glassmorphism effect, language switcher, and external links to fomo.cx are working perfectly. Mobile responsiveness is excellent.
passed_tests: Crypto Dashboard section visibility and display
All 8 dashboard widgets displaying correctly: Total M.Cap, Fear & Greed Index, BTC/ETH Dominance, Quick Access, Top Gainers, New Activities, 24H Volume, Traditional Markets
Navigation glass container with separate links (About/Projects/Roadmap/Team/Partners)
Separate Crypto/Core/Utility action buttons with different styling
RU/EN language switcher functionality in both desktop and mobile
Explore Full Dashboard button correctly linking to fomo.cx
Quick Access links properly directing to fomo.cx sections
Mobile responsiveness - dashboard adapts to mobile viewport
Mobile menu functionality with language switcher
Navigation links scroll behavior working correctly
Fear & Greed gauge with proper visualization
Dominance bars for BTC/ETH with correct percentages
Top Gainers list with crypto data and positive change indicators
New Activities section with project information and funding details
Traditional Markets widget showing Gold and S&P 500 data
Quick Access grid with 6 functional links to fomo.cx sections
